Review_title: Dumbest director produced a sheet film
Review_Text: How come a producer invest his money on this type of director ?! I mean, there should be a minimum a level knowledge about how a film should be made.Offcourse, Rohingya issue is very much interesting and timely for making a film. Threre are many aspects and angles in Rohingya issue, but this film choose nothing.Actually, there is no story, poor acting and stupid editting. It's totally a waste of time.
Un-cooked, Un-researched, Misinformed, Poorly presented documentary film based on the serious subject of Rohingya refugees. Seems this is produced with malafide intent.

Bangladesh has been sheltering over 1 million of Rohingya refugees and how many sheltered by India?Do you really want to know?Only 40,000.But the movie shows that India has done everything.The director-writer and the whole team may be just crazy.
